DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate IOP response to experimental dose of Latanoprost- PPDS in subjects with ocular hypertension or open-angle glaucoma.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study of the Latanoprost Punctal Plug Delivery System in Subjects With Ocular Hypertension or Open-Angle Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Over 18 yrs of age with ocular hypertension or openangle glaucoma Subjects who have a best corrected visual acuity of 20/100 or better Subjects who wear contact lenses. Uncontrolled medical conditions Subjects requiring chronic topical artifical tears, lubricants and/or requiring any other chronic topical medications Subjects who have a history of chronic or recurrent inflammatory eye disease
